snippet.title: Citizen Sleeper - Accolades + New Episodes Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wake up, Sleeper. You have no idea what’s coming.

Citizen Sleeper will be receiving NEW STORY content via three FREE episodic updates! 

The first episode, “FLUX”, arrives in July (date TBC). Episodes 2 and 3 are currently planned for release in October and early 2023 respectively, however dates are still to be confirmed.

View the roadmap at: bit.ly/sleeperepisodes
